channel.title: recursion – deadbadger.net
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: Quis custodiet (ipsos custodes)2? Oh, it’s me. Right.
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: I’ve just arrived home, having spent a pleasant evening in the company of Messrs Canon L. Printer and Henry The Depressed Fern. Printers, as any fule kno, were put on this Earth to test us, and to separate the merely persistent from those prepared to spend three solid hours making the requisite sacrifices of dead Continue reading →

Printers, as any fule kno, were put on this Earth to test us, and to separate the merely persistent from those prepared to spend three solid hours making the requisite sacrifices of dead Continue reading →
